S. Partarrieu

Hey there! I’m a French and Chilean software engineer currently working on my own thing.

I (try to) write code, read and think a lot. I’ve worked on decoding/analyzing neural signals from brain-machine interfaces within the Jia Liu Group, on using machine-learning to predict the presence of cancer through liquid biopsy genetic data at the Landau lab, and on using large language models to understand web pages automatically at Joko.

Outside of this, I love: climbing , playing tennis , skiing , travelling , observing the night sky , and enjoying a good party once in a while.

news

Aug 24, 2024 New article! Was a fun one.
Feb 20, 2023 Published! Go check out the article in Nature Neuroscience.
Sep 1, 2022 I was awarded the PRAIRIE (PaRis Artificial Intelligence Research Institute) master’s fellowship for 10 000€! This program supports master’s students in a few top programs and is awarded on academic criteria.
Happy to hear from you!
